course.title: Introduction to Business and Financial Statistics
course.meeting_text: Tu., Th., 10–11:30, and weekly sections to be arranged.
course.description: Introduces the technical skills required for data-driven analysis of business and financial data. Emphasis on applying statistical methods to summarize and make inferences from complex data and to develop quantitative models to assist business decision making. Topics include: how to collect and summarize financial data, understanding the concept of risk, portfolio construction and analysis, testing trading systems, and simulation techniques.
course.notes: The software packages Excel and R will be used to obtain quantitative solutions to financial problems.
